Token.Abstract: The SLAlert class allows access to, and control of, alerts within your application.
Creates and returns an alert object that matches an alert view with the specified title.
Creates and returns a handler that dismisses a matching alert using the default handling behavior.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly created handler that dismisses the corresponding alert using UIAutomation's default procedure.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a handler that dismisses a matching alert by tapping the button with the specified title.

Parameter.Name: buttonTitle
Parameter.Abstract: The title of the button to tap to dismiss the alert.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly created handler that dismisses the corresponding alert by tapping the button with the specified title.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a handler that sets the text of the specified text field of a matching alert to a specified value.

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: The text to enter into the field.

Parameter.Name: fieldType
Parameter.Abstract: The type of text field, corresponding to the alert's presentation style.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly created handler that sets the text of the specified text field of a matching alert to a text.

Token.Abstract: Returns the body of a JS function which evaluates a UIAAlert to see if it matches the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The body of a JS function which evaluates a UIAAlert "alert" to see if it matches a particular SLAlert.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a handler that relies on a user to dismiss an alert.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly created handler that does not dismiss the corresponding alert, but rather relies on a live user to dismiss the alert.
